items.title: DRINK WHEEL
items.text: Enable the <highlight>Drink Wheel</highlight> to add a fun twist to your drinking game! The wheel gives you a 50% chance of taking 1 sip, with smaller odds for 2, 3, or 4 sips — or even having to down your whole drink.

items.title:
PACK: CALM AND CASUAL
[IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/chill.svg ALT:Chill Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/creative.svg ALT:Creative Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/funny.svg ALT:Funny Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/deep.svg ALT:Deep Difficulty Icon]
items.text: A wholesome mix of fun, everyday scenarios and dream-big moments—from going viral to starting a podcast. Light, playful, and perfect for spotting hidden talents and quirks in your group.

items.title:
PACK: MILD MISCHIEF
[IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/chill.svg ALT:Chill Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/funny.svg ALT:Funny Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/cheeky.svg ALT:Cheeky Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/flirty.svg ALT:Flirty Difficulty Icon]
items.text: A playful mix of harmless chaos, awkward moments, and everyday slip-ups. Expect accidental texts, lost phones, weird crushes, and low-stakes mayhem that'll make everyone laugh and point fingers.

items.title:
PACK: UNSOLICITED STRAYS
[IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/chaotic.svg ALT:Chaotic Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/cheeky.svg ALT:Cheeky Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/flirty.svg ALT:Flirty Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/funny.svg ALT:Funny Difficulty Icon]
items.text: A chaotic blend of risky romance, bad decisions, and wild what-ifs. Think ex texts, secret hookups, late-night confessions, and moments you’d never want on record.

items.title:
PACK: OPEN SEASON
[IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/sexual.svg ALT:Sexual Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/naughty.svg ALT:Naughty Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/fiery.svg ALT:Fiery Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/nsfw.svg ALT:NSFW Difficulty Icon]
items.text: No rules, no regrets. A shameless deep dive into hookups, betrayals, dirty secrets, and moments you hope never see daylight.

items.title:
PACK: UNFILITED ASSAULTS
[IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/sexual.svg ALT:Sexual Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/fiery.svg ALT:Fiery Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/naughty.svg ALT:Naughty Difficulty Icon][IMG:/images/icons/difficulty/nsfw.svg ALT:NSFW Difficulty Icon]
items.text: Brace yourself. This pack pulls no punches—raw, explicit, and offensively honest. Not for the faint of heart or the easily offended.
